name: Spiral (HackTrout)
description:
Expand across the galaxy by establishing mining colonies on bountiful planets. Before a planet is completely extracted, build ships to colonize new planets. If you do not expand, your species will go extinct! How to play

You start off on an empty planet and can move to a mining planet by left clicking the route between them. After a while the mining planet will run out of resources and become empty. Before that happens you can build ships that will launch when a mining planet becomes empty. You can make bigger ships that will carry spare resources to other planets.

The game ends when all mining planets become empty.

Controls
  • Movement: Left Click on travel routes between planets.
  • Building Ships: Left Click on launch points on mining colonies. You can stack the amount of resources that will be launched from the planet and transported to the new planet.
  • Mining: Press space to speed up the extraction of resources on a mining colony.

Routes turn bright yellow when ships land on planets that have already been discovered.
